ResourceHeader.ResourceName: WIND Spacecraft Home Page and Data Repository
ResourceHeader.Description: Data Repository for WIND MFI version 3 and 4 daily CDF files as well as instrument descriptions and related links for the WIND mission.

InformationURL.Name: WIND Spacecraft Home Page
InformationURL.URL: http://wind.nasa.gov/URL> WIND home page with description of instruments and access to data files.
